Title: Day 6: 10:00 A.M. - 11:00 A.M.
Plot: Wayne prepares to talk to the nation as L.A. deals with the fall-out from the nuclear blast. Fayed tries to set up a deal with a new trigger man who can help with the four remaining bombs. Sandra is outraged when the FBI forces Walid to wear a wire in the hopes of gaining information from his fellow inmates. Assad provides CTU with a lead, but Jack finds that it takes a personal twist when he learns that the terrorists may have connections to his estranged family.
GuestStars: David Hunt,  Scott William Winters,  Paul McCrane,  Peter Smith,  Andrea Grano,  Matt Battaglia,  Missy Crider,  Mark Bramhall,  Ryan Cutrona,  Haaz Sleiman,  Al Faris,  Adrian Neil
